question: Teachers are more responsible for social and intellectual development of students than parents
text: Every professional occupies a specific niche in society, doctor to hell, Engineers to design and Bankers to handle finance. Teachers are a standout subsumption entity, I strongly agree that they hold a huge role  in the growth of  Childers life.

The role of educators in the nation is both significant and valuable, they are the one main pillar of  society and main  source of knowledge and provide value to next generation, the role of parents is important in every kid's life, but when they come to school faculty member plays an important part of their day to day routine. apart from providing  formal education, mostly Educational institute constantly update their facility. with various contemporary methods and training

In Additionally, Schools are not only concentrating on academics but also extracurcuem like debates sports dance and many more schools where youngsters interact with peers apart from the daily classroom interaction these kinds of activities give opportunities were debits Sports, dance, and money more schools where the youngsters interact with peer apart from daily classroom interaction, depending on their interests. These can be scouting, sporting events, and other organizations, just to name a few. These opportunities basically enhance leadership skills, camaraderie, and teamwork, These kinds of activities  give  opportunities where enhance leadership and teamwork this would help them in their future.

To End, I believe that when it comes to the overall academics and social skills of the youth, mentors of the education system play a crucial part in  society. It is because they're professionally trained and performed so.
